text:
I did some more digging. Installing September 26, 2023—KB5030310 (OS Build 22621.2361) Preview does NOT install Copilot. - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/september-26-2023-kb5030310-os-build-22621-2361-preview-363ac1ae-6ea8-41b3-b3cc-22a2a5682faf… The September 26, 2023—Windows configuration update installs Copilot. This is a separate optional update. - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/september-26-2023-windows-configuration-update-542780c2-594c-46cb-979d-11116fe164ba… The configuration update is part of continuous innovation announced earlier this year - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/delivering-continuous-innovation-in-windows-11-b0aa0a27-ea9a-4365-9224-cb155e517f12… And can be managed commercial control - thanks @ariaupdated 
 - https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/commercial-control-for-continuous-innovation/ba-p/3737575… Enterprise devices can’t enable the toggle to get latest updates unless you deploy a policy to allow - See blue box here - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/release-health/status-windows-11-22h2… https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/enable-and-control-optional-updates-for-your-organization/ba-p/3905218… All the settings for WUfB policies including ones not available in the built in Updates/Feature Updates policies in Intune - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/waas-configure-wufb… And here’s a specific url for the controls for the continuous innovation updates - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/whats-new/temporary-enterprise-feature-control… Also @ncbrady 
 has a great blog on this now as well. Thanks for documenting your testing - https://x.com/ncbrady/status/1707698074687086776?s=46&t=wqKIfQ91Lwnlhukm2orOpQ…
 From Adam Gross [MVP] - ASquareDozen.com on X: "I did some more digging. Installing September 26, 2023—KB5030310 (OS Build 22621.2361) Preview does NOT install Copilot. - https://t.co/sxXW1s1YwQ The September 26, 2023—Windows configuration update installs Copilot. This is a separate optional update. -…" / X (twitter.com)
 -- %40BY5PR01MB5635.prod.exchangelabs.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Links on CoPilot
metadata.keywords: ["2023 — windows configuration update install copilot", "continuous innovation announce early"]
